summary: AI Engineer & Full Stack Developer specializing in machine learning, model deployment, and scalable AI systems, React Native, and Blockchain. 3x Hackathon Winner, Finalists in many. Led AI projects achieving 70% efficiency gains. Expert in NLP, Computer Vision, MLOps, and Solidity & Rust.

bullets: Spearheaded the development of a generative AI-powered meeting insights application using advanced LLMs for topic modeling, NER, translation, and meeting minutes generation.
Led MLOps & LLMOps pipelines for continuous model retraining and optimization.
Enhanced Large Language Models including LLaMA, Falcon, and Mistral with Parameter Efficient Fine-Tuning and LoRA.
metrics: Improved model accuracy on educational datasets by 15%

bullets: Deployed a sentiment analysis model leveraging BERT for multilingual text data.
Orchestrated the design and automation of data pipelines and model training workflows for semi-supervised learning.
Spearheaded the migration of legacy SQL Server databases to PostgreSQL.
metrics: Increased accuracy of identifying negative customer feedback by 30%
Resulted in a 25% improvement in data accessibility

projects.name: StockIO
projects.description: Engineered a stock market prediction model using LSTM for forecasting and BERT for sentiment analysis.
bullets: Achieved a Sharpe ratio of 3.0 indicating improved risk-adjusted returns exceeding market benchmarks.
Enhanced the accuracy of stock predictions by 15%.

projects.name: Smart Cataloging / ProductScan
projects.description: Created an AI-powered product recognition system using YOLOv11nano for product detection.

education.institution: Madan Mohan Malviya University of Technology

achievements: Won 3 Hackathons and Finalists in Many, including having 4th position in BullnCode Hackathon at IIT Bombay Techfest and Code-Cubicle 2.0.
Taught Mobile Development to over 100 students in React Native Expo CLI, building a Splitwise app clone with AI integrations.
